activities: Nasty Gal is an ecommerce company, and we sell products online to customers around the world, including the EU and Switzerland.  We collect personal information from citizens in the EU and Switzerland for transactional purposes (to complete purchases) and for marketing purposes (when users want to receive marketing information from us).  The information is used by us for these indicated purposes, and we also engage third parties to help us on our behalf to accomplish these purposes.  We retain this information for as long as is necessary for the purposes and for legal reasons.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
